opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: New Orleans City Park Improvement Association v. Detiege

opinion:
358 U.S. 54 (1958)

NEW ORLEANS CITY PARK IMPROVEMENT ASSOCIATION
v.
DETIEGE ET AL.

No. 295.

Supreme Court of United States.

Decided October 20, 1958.
APPEAL FROM THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE FIFTH CIRCUIT.

Ed J. de Verges for appellant.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
